page.title: 04Poultry Farming,Turkeys.
page.content: The 10,000 Christms dinners raised at Manor Farm are fed a mixture of wheat and barley grown at the farm plus a grain balancer which is high in protein and vitamins.Whilst being fattened they are given injections against Newcastle Disease (foulpest) and Pasteurella-Erysipelas.Manor Farm supplies Smithfield market,25-30 local butchers and 500 birds are sold retail in "at the farm door" sales.The enterprise provides a limited amount of local employment as around 20 casual workers are employed for plucking before Christmas.
